summary: Your personalized 3-day trip to Batu has been carefully crafted to match your preferences. Experience a perfect blend of family-friendly attractions and natural beauty within your budget.

activities.name: Museum Angkut
activities.locationNote: Jl. Terusan Sultan Agung No.2, Ngaglik, Batu
activities.notes: Start your day at Museum Angkut, a fascinating transportation museum perfect for families. Explore diverse vehicle collections from different eras.

activities.name: Lunch at Warung Soto Batu
activities.notes: Enjoy lunch at a local restaurant featuring authentic Malang cuisine. Budget-friendly options available.

activities.name: Jatim Park 2 & Batu Secret Zoo
activities.notes: Visit Jatim Park 2 featuring Batu Secret Zoo. Great for families with various animal exhibits and educational experiences.

activities.name: Return to Hotel
activities.notes: Return to hotel and rest for the next day's adventure.

activities.name: Coban Rondo Waterfall
activities.notes: Morning hike at Coban Rondo Waterfall. Enjoy the fresh mountain air and beautiful natural scenery perfect for nature lovers.

activities.name: Lunch at Local Restaurant
activities.notes: Traditional Indonesian cuisine with mountain view.

activities.name: Kampung Warna-Warni (Rainbow Village)
activities.notes: Explore the colorful Rainbow Village and capture Instagram-worthy photos.

activities.name: Dinner at Alun-Alun Batu Night Market
activities.notes: End your day at Alun-Alun Batu, enjoy the vibrant night market atmosphere and try local street food.

activities.name: Eco Green Park
activities.notes: Visit Eco Green Park for an educational eco-tourism experience. Great for learning about conservation and environment.

activities.name: Batu Traditional Market
activities.notes: Shopping time at Batu traditional market. Pick up souvenirs and local products at affordable prices.

activities.name: Paralayang Batu (Paragliding Viewpoint)
activities.notes: Final stop at a scenic viewpoint for sunset photos before heading home. Perfect ending to your trip.
